Level A.name: Keyboard
Level A.description: All functionality must be accessible via a keyboard.
Level A.example: Dropdown menu navigable with Tab/Enter keys.

Level A.name: No Keyboard Trap
Level A.description: Focus is not trapped within elements.

Level A.name: Character Key Shortcuts
Level A.description: Shortcuts can be disabled or remapped.
Level A.example: 'X' to close window must be configurable.

Level A.name: Timing Adjustable
Level A.description: Users can extend or turn off time limits.
Level A.example: Session timeout warning with extension option.

Level A.name: Three Flashes or Below
Level A.description: Avoid flashing more than 3 times per second.

Level A.name: Bypass Blocks
Level A.description: Provide skip links for repetitive content.

Level A.name: Link Purpose (In Context)
Level A.example: 'Read our Accessibility Policy' instead of 'Learn more'

Level A.name: Pointer Gestures
Level A.example: Zoom button in addition to pinch gesture.

Level A.name: Pointer Cancellation
Level A.description: Actions triggered by pointer input must be cancellable.
Level A.example: Submit only on release, not press.

Level A.name: Label in Name
Level A.description: Accessible name must match visible label.
Level A.example: Button labeled 'Search' must also have name 'Search'.

Level AA.name: Multiple Ways
Level AA.description: Provide multiple ways to find content.

Level AA.name: Focus Visible
Level AA.description: Interactive elements must show visible focus.

Level AA.name: Target Size
Level AA.description: Touch targets must be at least 44x44px.

Level AAA (Optional).name: Keyboard (No Exception)
Level AAA (Optional).description: All functionality accessible via keyboard with no exceptions.

Level AAA (Optional).name: No Timing
Level AAA (Optional).description: No time limits unless real-time event.

Level AAA (Optional).name: Re-authenticating
Level AAA (Optional).description: Session data must persist after re-authentication.

Level AAA (Optional).name: Timeouts
Level AAA (Optional).description: Warn users about timeouts and their consequences.

Level AAA (Optional).name: Three Flashes
Level AAA (Optional).description: No flashing over 3 times per second.

Level AAA (Optional).name: Link Purpose (Link Only)
Level AAA (Optional).description: Link purpose must be clear from the link text alone.

Level AAA (Optional).name: Focus Appearance
Level AAA (Optional).description: Focus indicators must be highly visible.

Level AAA (Optional).name: Concurrent Input Mechanism
Level AAA (Optional).description: Allow use of multiple input methods (touch, keyboard, etc.).
